story.title: Our story
story.paragraph1: Holidays Beach Torrox was born in 2014 from the dream of a Malaga family to share the beauty of Torrox with travelers from around the world. What started as a small collection of family apartments has become one of the most respected vacation rental companies on the Costa del Sol.
story.paragraph2: Our passion for hospitality and deep knowledge of the area allows us to offer authentic and personalized experiences. Each apartment has been carefully selected and equipped to guarantee maximum comfort and satisfaction for our guests.
story.paragraph3: We believe in responsible and sustainable tourism, working closely with the local community to preserve the natural and cultural beauty of Torrox while offering unforgettable experiences to our visitors.

faq.title: We answer all your questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our apartments and services.

booking.question: How can I make a reservation?
booking.answer: You can book directly through our website or contact us via WhatsApp. We'll send you a secure link to complete payment and you'll receive confirmation immediately.

checkin.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
checkin.answer: Check-in is from 4:00 PM and check-out until 11:00 AM. If you need special times, contact us in advance and we'll do our best to accommodate you.

cancellation.question: What is the cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: We offer free cancellation up to 48 hours before arrival. For later cancellations, the first night's charge will apply. In exceptional cases, we study each situation individually.

amenities.question: What services do the apartments include?
amenities.answer: All our apartments include free WiFi, air conditioning, fully equipped kitchen, bed linen and towels. Many also have a terrace or balcony with sea views.

pets.question: Do you allow pets?
pets.answer: Some of our apartments allow pets with a supplement of €15/night. It's necessary to inform us at the time of booking and follow our coexistence rules.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfer and PayPal. Payment is made securely through our platform integrated with AvaiBook.
